0.user_question: Mico and Marco wanted to get to know each other. They realized that the sum of their ages is 2523797. What will be the sum of their ages in 10 years?

subanswer.text: Let x be the age of Mico now. Then the age of Marco is 2523797 - x. Since they both age one year each year, in 10 years, the age of Mico will be x + 10, and the age of Marco will be (2523797 - x) + 10. The sum of their ages in 10 years is then (x + 10) + (2523797 - x + 10), which simplifies to 2523807. The answer is 2523807.

2.subquestion: Now we can answer the question: What will be the sum of their ages in 10 years?

subanswer.text: In summary, the sum of their ages in 10 years is 2523807. The answer is 2523807.
